name: Gossip Girl - School Queen
summary:
XOXO, Gossip Girl!
Arrisa is the Queen in High School every year! but now, she's losing her fans!
She need to make herself even prettier, participate in more hobbies and activites, so that she can increase her fans to keep her School Queen status!
In order to become a role model for her classmates, she need to have a lovely appearance!

Product Features:
- Spark your inspiration and design a look that turns heads to brighten up her day!
- By taking care of the body, you'll brighten up your beauty!
- After a workout, have a deep spa to make the skin clean and clear!
- Have perfect makeup to brighten the face!
- DIY your own School Queen nail style!
- Dress with style, Queen Bees stand out!
- Being proud of who you are is essential in popularity! Let's see who is the school queen in top!


How to Play:
- Use interactive controls to play the game.
- Get the coolest outfits at the fanciest shopping mall in the city.
- Swipe to apply makeup and create a new look.
- Your nail beauty salon designs are going to be epic.
